Description.Name: Sturmfeur
Description.Details: The Huitzilopochtli, often referred to as the Huey, is a Clan combat vehicle that was created as a mobile artillery platform. The Clan disdain for both artillery and combat vehicles led the Huitzilopochtli to be built around an Internal Combustion Engine, which can only propel it to 32 km/h. Designers also skimped on armor protection, with a mere five and a half tons considered adequate for a unit that should be kilometers away from the battle. The reason for the Huitzilopochtli's existence is its pair of Arrow IV launchers. Four tons of ammunition allow it to vary the types of ammo it carries. The Huitzilopochtli carries a Ultra Autocannon/5, a pair Medium Pulse Lasers and an ER Small Laser for self defence. A pair of machine guns protect the sides of the vehicle. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. ICE: Air breathing Combustion Engine. This unit can not deploy in thin atmosphere. Movement: 2/3 Hex: 60/90 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 355 45 Left 330 45 Right 330 45 Rear 240 45 Turret 349 45 Total 1604 225

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
